title: Game crashed during Champion select
body: I mean, I know this is a very usual situation, but the hopeless thing was, I never have a chance to load back to the room. Sometimes the game crashed but I would have enough time to re-log in and pick my champion or ban, but the problem is I can never go back to the original room when I tried to re-log in. I would stay at the home page and the client will tell me I am already in the game... Just please someone let me know how can I solve this problem, this is so hurting when I was doing ranked game.

replies.body:
Crashes in champ select are largely caused by connection issues to our servers caused by an *unstable connection*. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through the necessary steps to ensure your local network settings aren't conflicting with League.

Please let me know if this caused any change.

I am not sure if there is any change but I haven't experienced it for a while, but of this happens again, can you tell me how can I get back to the champion select, every time i was sent back to the home page of league client and the game would say "game is in process" or whatever.
If you've worked through all those steps, the issue should happen again. If it does, reach back out to me and let me know so we can continue to troubleshoot this.
